title: Aspiration-assisted bioprinting for precise positioning of biologics
publication_info: B Ayan, DN Heo, Z Zhang, M Dey… - Science …, 2020 - advances.sciencemag.org
snippet:

3D space has been a major obstacle. Here, we unveil “aspiration-assisted bioprinting (AAB),” …
